```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
nfl_team_statistics <- read_csv("~/Desktop/Repos/SYE/project1/nfl_team_statistics.csv")
nfl_team_statistics

# Define UI ----
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("NFL"),
  tabsetPanel(
    tabPanel("Offense Completions",
      sidebarLayout(
        sidebarPanel(
          selectizeInput(inputId = "team",
                         label = "Choose a team",
                         choices = unique(nfl_team_statistics$team),
                         selected = "NE")
        ),
        mainPanel(
          plotOutput(outputId = "plot")
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    one_team <- nfl_team_statistics |> filter(team == input$team)
    ggplot(data = one_team, aes(x = season, y = offense_completion_percentage)) +
      geom_line()
  })

}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
